put.description:
Create a upload session, which is required before uploading files. After upload session created, client should start uploading using the information included in the upload session. The implementation of upload differs from different storage policy type, you can find Cloudreve's implentation in [uploader](https://github.com/cloudreve/frontend/tree/master/src/component/Uploader/core/uploader).

A general file uploading includes 3 steps: Create upload session, upload chunks, finish upload request. For small files, please consider using [Update file content](./update-file-content-306591838e0).

### 1. Create upload session

Use current method to create an upload session.

### 2. Upload chunks

* For local storage policy, or any other storage policy with `storage_policy`.`relay` set to `true`, use [Upload file chunk](./upload-file-chunk-306698012e0);
* For remote storage policy, send chunks to the URL defined in `upload_urls`, there should be only one element in `upload_urls`. The request is similar to [Upload file chunk](./upload-file-chunk-306698012e0), except:
    * Chunk index is passed through query `chunk`, e.g. `http://slavecloudreve.com:5213/api/v4/slave/upload/f1dd2c8c-0c51-475b-a086-b338ae1d8109?chunk=2`
    * `Authorization` shoud be the value of `credential` in upload session, e.g. `Bearer Cr sBnnQ3rZ-UBr7d8ohKpUFtsQc8OMLuWwn1VhuJtdc5k=:1749623351`
* For any other storage policies, please refer to:
    * S3: [UploadPart](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/API/API_UploadPart.html)
    * OSS: [UploadPart](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/oss/developer-reference/uploadpart)
    * COS: [UploadPart](https://www.tencentcloud.com/document/product/436/7750)
    * OBS: [Uploading Parts](https://support.huaweicloud.com/intl/en-us/api-obs/obs_04_0099.html)
    * OneDrive: [Upload bytes to the upload session](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/onedrive/developer/rest-api/api/driveitem_createuploadsession?view=odsp-graph-online#upload-bytes-to-the-upload-session)
    * Qiniu: [分块上传数据](https://developer.qiniu.com/kodo/6366/upload-part)
    * Upyun: [大文件上传](https://help.upyun.com/knowledge-base/form_api/#e5a4a7e69687e4bbb6e4b88ae4bca0)

### 3. Finish upload

* For local/remote/upyun storage policy, or any other storage policy with `storage_policy`.`relay` set to `true`, you don't need to finish upload, it's automatically finished after last chunk uploaded.
* OneDrive: [Complete OneDrive upload](https://cloudrevev4.apifox.cn/complete-onedrive-upload-295173813e0.md)
* S3: [CompleteMultipartUpload](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/API/API_CompleteMultipartUpload.html), then send [Complete S3 upload](https://cloudrevev4.apifox.cn/complete-s3-upload-295177181e0.md)
* COS: [Complete Multipart Upload](https://www.tencentcloud.com/ind/document/product/436/7742), then send [Complete COS upload](https://cloudrevev4.apifox.cn/complete-cos-upload-295177009e0.md)
* OBS: [Completing a Multipart Upload](https://support.huaweicloud.com/intl/en-us/api-obs/obs_04_0102.html), then send [Complete OBS upload](https://cloudrevev4.apifox.cn/complete-obs-upload-295177687e0.md)
* Qiniu: [完成文件上传](https://developer.qiniu.com/kodo/6368/complete-multipart-upload)

get.description:
Get realtime progress of the given task. Note that not all phases and all task types support getting progress. Empty response will be returned if there's no available progress info.

The response is a map between progress type and the actual progress. Common progress types are:


| Progress Type | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `upload_single_<index>` | Uploaded/Total bytes of a single uplaod thread. |
|`upload_count`|Count of processed/total files.|
|`upload`| Uploaded/Total bytes of all files to be processed in this step.|
|`imported`| Imported/Total files.|
|`indexed`| Used in importing file tasks, indicating indexed files.|

Only tasks owned by current authenticated user is available. For admin users, all tasks are available in this method.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the task.

data.description: Map of progress type and the progress content.

logo.description: URL of the logo image for light mode.

logo_light.description: URL of the logo image for dark mode.

tos_url.description: URL of the document for term of serivce.

privacy_policy_url.description: URL of the document for privacy policy.

emoji_preset.description: JSON encoded emoji preset for customizing file icons.

share_point_gain_rate.description: Percentage of share owner's commission rate.

max_batch_size.description: The maximum number of files in a batch operation.

anonymous_purchase.description: Whether to allow non-logged-in users to purchase share links directly.

point_price.description: Price for recharging credit points with money (in minimum currency unit). Fill 0 to disable credit recharge.

shop_nav_enabled.description: Whether to display 'Shop' items in the sidebar navigation.

items.description: Custom items for the sidebar navigation.

url.description: URL to reidrect to after user clicked this item.

custom_html.description: Custom HTML contents injected at predefined locations.

headless_footer.description: Custom HTML to inject at the footer of landing page.

headless_bottom.description: Custom HTML to inject at the bottom of landing page, stil within the white border.

sidebar_bottom.description: Custom HTML to inject at the footer of the sidebar navigation.

url.description: URL to reidrect to after user clicked this item.

id.description: ID of the custom props. You can get the corresponding metadata key by appending `props:` prefix.

max.description: Maximum length for text fields, maximum value for number/rating field.

min.description: Minimum length for text fields, minimum value for number field.

time.description: Valid duration of the membership SKU.

points.description: Price in points. Empty value indicate paying with points is disabled.

name.description: Display name of the storage SKU.

points.description: Price in points. Empty value indicate paying with points is disabled.

name.title: Stripe
name.description: Display name of the payment method.

display_name.description: Display name of the app, can be i18next key.

max_size.description: Max supported size in bytes of the source file.

total.description: Total items to process. Could be file size in bytes, or item counts depending on the progress type.

current.description: Currently procressed items. Could be file size in bytes, or item counts depending on the progress type.

identifier.description: Identifier of this progress (if applied). For batched file tasks, this could be used to differentiate different files processed in parallel.

page.description: Current page starting from `0`, only applied to offset pagination.

page_size.description: Maximum items included in one page.

total_items.description: Total count of items, only applied to offset pagination.

next_token.description: Token used to request the next page in cursor pagination.

is_cursor.description: Whether the response is using cursor pagination.

next_token.description: Token used to request the next page in cursor pagination.

is_cursor.description: Whether the response is using cursor pagination.

content.description: Content and additional props of the activity.

created_at.description: Datetime when the activity is triggered.

user.description: The user who triggered the activity (if any). `null` value indicates this operation is executed by system or an anonymous visitor.

email.description: Email of the user. For anonymous session, it is empty.

created_at.description: Time at which the user is created. For anonymous session, this value is invalid.

avatar.description: Source type of the profile picture. Empty value indicates no profile picture.

share_links_in_profile.description: What type of share link is visable in user's profile.

x-apifox-enum.description: Only public share links are visable.

version_id.description: ID of the version blob correlated to this activity (if any).

category.description: Category of this log. Definition can be found in [`explorer.ts`](https://github.com/cloudreve/frontend/blob/master/src/api/explorer.ts#L20).

original_name.description: Original name of the file in renaming operation.

new_name.description: New name of the file in renaming operation.

storage_policy_id.description: ID of the correlated storage policy.

storage_policy.description: Name of the correlated storage policy.

context_hint.description:
ContextHint is used to speed up following operations under this listed directory. It persists some intermedia state so that the following request don't need to query database again.
One typical case is loading thumbnails under the listed folder, carry context hint in `X-Cr-Context-Hint` header in the thumbnail request can speed up backend database operations.

recursion_limit_reached.description: Only applies to search list, indicating whether the recursion limit has been reached. Client side should suggest user narrow down search root folder in this case.

mixed_type.description: If it's `false`, folders is alway placed in front of the file list. If it's `true`, folders might be mixed with files in the list. Cloudreve will try its best not to mix file types, but in search result list, this value is `false`.

single_file_view.description: Indicating the frontend UI should use "Single share file" UI, since there's only one file in single file share link.

storage_policy.description: Storage policy that should be used to upload new files to this folder.

view.description:
View setting stored in the server for current folder.
It could be null, indicating local preference is preferred.

page_size.description: The number of items to display per page.

order.description: The field to order the results by.

order_direction.description: The direction to order the results.

view.description: The view mode for the explorer.

thumbnail.description: Whether to display thumbnails in grid view.

gallery_width.description: The width of a single item in gallery view.

columns.description: The columns to display in the list view.

width.description: Width of the column in px. Default width will be used for null value.

metadata_key.description: Metadata key for metadata column (`type` equals `3`).

capability.description:
[Boolset](https://docs.cloudreve.org/api/boolset) encoded set of capabilities supported in this filesystem.
Capability definition can be found at [File System Capabilities](https://docs.cloudreve.org/api/boolset#file-system-capability)

captcha.description: User input value of the graphical CAPTCHA. Required if graphic CAPTCHA enabled for current action.

ticket.description: Ticket/Token of the CAPTCHA. Required if CAPTCHA is enabled for current action. Can be obtained from [Get CAPTCHA](https://cloudrevev4.apifox.cn/get-captcha-289470260e0.md).
